EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Documenting RESTful APIs.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Documenting RESTful APIs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Documenting RESTful APIs with Andy Wilkinson. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, February 3, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e2040209d0ea0f52193eefe2dfe8816c8>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 666 518 914
Thank you,
